org.teatrove.teaservlet.stats
Class TeaServletRequestStats

java.lang.Object
  org.teatrove.teaservlet.stats.TeaServletRequestStats

public class TeaServletRequestStats
extends Object

This class functions as the mediator for handling all http request level statistics gathering and derivation. This class logs template requests with the TemplateStats object associated with a given template.

Author:
Scott Jappinen

getInstance

public static TeaServletRequestStats getInstance()
Returns a static instance of TeaServletRequestStats.

Returns:
the tea servlet request stats.

applyProperties

public void applyProperties(PropertyMap properties)
This method applies properties from a stats block in the tea servlet config.

Parameters:
properties -

getStats

public TemplateStats getStats(String fullTemplateName)
Returns the template stats for a given template name.

Parameters:
fullTemplateName - the full name of the template with '.'s as delimeters.
Returns:
the template stats

getTemplateStats

public TemplateStats[] getTemplateStats()
Returns an array of template stats. Returns the template raw and aggregate statistics so as to better understand the performance of templates through time.

Returns:
the template stats for this given template.

log

public void log(String fullTemplateName,
                long startTime,
                long stopTime,
                long contentLength,
                Object[] params)
Logs an invokation of an http template invocation.

Parameters:
fullTemplateName - the name of the template
startTime - the time the template was invoked.
stopTime - the time the template completed.
contentLength - the content length of the result of the template.
params - the parameter values the template was invoked with.

getStatisticsMap

public Map<String,TemplateStats> getStatisticsMap()
Returns the template name -> template stats map.

Returns:
the mapping of template names to stats.

setRawWindowSize

public void setRawWindowSize(int rawWindowSize)
Sets the raw window size. Resets all statistics.

Parameters:
rawWindowSize -

getRawWindowSize

public int getRawWindowSize()
Returns the raw window size. This defines the number of raw data entries that will be kept in memory for all templates.

Returns:
the raw window size.

getAggregateWindowSize

public int getAggregateWindowSize()
Returns the aggregate window size. This defines the number of aggregate intervals that will be kept in memory for all templates.

Returns:

setAggregateWindowSize

public void setAggregateWindowSize(int aggregateWindowSize)
Sets the aggregate interval size. Resets all statistics.

Parameters:
aggregateWindowSize -

reset

public void reset()
Resets all raw data and aggregate interval statistics.

reset

public void reset(int initialMapSize)
Resets all raw data and aggregate interval statistics.

Parameters:
initialMapSize - the initial size of the template name / stats map
